00059 static GdkPixbuf *
00060 gtk_icon_theme_fallback (const gchar *name, gint size)
00061 {
00062     GdkPixbuf *pixbuf = NULL;
00063     GError *err = NULL;
00064     GString *fallback = NULL;
00065     GtkIconInfo *iinfo = NULL;
00066 
00067     /* assertion checks */
00068     g_assert (name);
00069 
00070     iinfo = gtk_icon_theme_lookup_icon (gtk_icon_theme_get_default (), 
00071             name, size, GTK_ICON_LOOKUP_USE_BUILTIN);
00072     if (iinfo) {
00073         g_debug ("Using stock icon for %s", name);
00074         pixbuf = gtk_icon_info_load_icon (iinfo, &err);
00075         gtk_icon_info_free (iinfo);
00076     } else {
00077         g_debug ("Using fallback icon for %s", name);
00078         fallback = g_string_new ("");
00079         g_string_printf (fallback, GPM_DATA "%s.png", name);
00080         g_debug ("Using filename %s", fallback->str);
00081         pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_new_from_file (fallback->str, &err);
00082         g_string_free (fallback, TRUE);
00083     }
00084     /* check we actually got the icon */
00085     if (!pixbuf)
00086         g_warning ("failed to get %s!", name);
00087     return pixbuf;
00088 }
00089 
00095 static gint
00096 get_index_from_percent (gint percent)
00097 {
00098     gint num;
00099     /* invalid input */
00100     if (percent < 0)
00101         return 0;
00102     if (percent > 100)
00103         return 8;
00104     /* work out value */
00105     num = ((percent + 4) * 8 ) / 100;
00106     if (num < 0)
00107         return 0;
00108     else if (num > 8)
00109         return 8;
00110     return num;
00111 }
00112 
00118 static GdkPixbuf *
00119 create_icon_pixbuf (GenericObject *slotData)
00120 {
00121     GdkPixbuf *pixbuf = NULL;
00122     GenericObject slotDataVirt;
00123     gint num;
00124     gchar *computed_name = NULL;
00125 
00126     /* assertion checks */
00127     g_assert (slotData);
00128 
00129     if (slotData->powerDevice == POWER_PRIMARY_BATTERY) {
00130         /* have to work out for all objects for multibattery setups */
00131         slotDataVirt.percentageCharge = 100;
00132         create_virtual_of_type (objectData, &slotDataVirt, slotData->powerDevice);
00133         num = get_index_from_percent (slotDataVirt.percentageCharge);
00134         computed_name = g_strdup_printf ("gnome-power-system%s-%d-of-8", 
00135                     state_data.onBatteryPower ? "" : "-ac", num);
00136         pixbuf = gtk_icon_theme_fallback (computed_name, 22);
00137         g_debug ("computed_name = %s", computed_name);
00138         g_assert (pixbuf != NULL);
00139         g_free (computed_name);
00140     } else if (slotData->powerDevice == POWER_UPS) {
00141         num = get_index_from_percent (slotDataVirt.percentageCharge);
00142         computed_name = g_strdup_printf ("gnome-power-system-ups-%d-of-8", num);
00143         pixbuf = gtk_icon_theme_fallback (computed_name, 22);
00144         g_debug ("computed_name = %s", computed_name);
00145         g_assert (pixbuf != NULL);
00146         g_free (computed_name);
00147     } else if (slotData->powerDevice == POWER_AC_ADAPTER) {
00148         pixbuf = gtk_icon_theme_fallback ("gnome-dev-acadapter", 22);
00149     } else {
00150         g_error ("create_icon_pixbuf called with unknown type %i!",
00151             slotData->powerDevice);
00152     }
00153     /* make sure we got something */
00154     if (!pixbuf)
00155         g_error ("Failed to get pixbuf.\n"
00156              "Maybe GNOME Power Manager is not installed correctly!");
00157     return pixbuf;
00158 }

00164 void
00165 icon_destroy (TrayData *eggtrayicon)
00166 {
00167     /* assertion checks */
00168     g_assert (eggtrayicon);
00169 
00170     g_debug ("icon_destroy");
00171     if (eggtrayicon->popup_menu)
00172         g_free (eggtrayicon->popup_menu);
00173     if (eggtrayicon->tray_icon_tooltip)
00174         g_free (eggtrayicon->tray_icon_tooltip);
00175     gtk_widget_hide_all (GTK_WIDGET (eggtrayicon->tray_icon));
00176     g_free (eggtrayicon);
00177     eggtrayicon = NULL;
00178 }
00179 
00183 void
00184 gpn_icon_destroy (void)
00185 {
00186     if (eggtrayicon)
00187         icon_destroy (eggtrayicon);
00188     eggtrayicon = NULL;
00189 }

00196 GString *
00197 get_object_tooltip (GenericObject *slotData)
00198 {
00199     GString *remaining = NULL;
00200     GString *tooltip = NULL;
00201     gchar *devicestr = NULL;
00202     gchar *chargestate = NULL;
00203 
00204     /* assertion checks */
00205     g_assert (slotData);
00206 
00207     devicestr = convert_powerdevice_to_string (slotData->powerDevice);
00208     if (slotData->powerDevice == POWER_PRIMARY_BATTERY ||
00209         slotData->powerDevice == POWER_UPS) {
00210         tooltip = g_string_new ("bug?");
00211         remaining = get_time_string (slotData);
00212         chargestate = get_chargestate_string (slotData);
00213         if (slotData->present) {
00214             g_string_printf (tooltip, "%s %s (%i%%)", 
00215                     devicestr, chargestate, slotData->percentageCharge);
00216             if (remaining) {
00217                 g_string_append_printf (tooltip, "\n%s", remaining->str);
00218                 g_string_free (remaining, TRUE);
00219             }
00220         } else {
00221             g_string_printf (tooltip, "%s %s", 
00222                     devicestr, chargestate);
00223         }
00224     } else if (slotData->powerDevice == POWER_KEYBOARD ||
00225            slotData->powerDevice == POWER_MOUSE) {
00226         tooltip = g_string_new ("bug?");
00227         g_string_printf (tooltip, "%s (%i%%)", 
00228                     devicestr, slotData->percentageCharge);
00229     } else if (slotData->powerDevice == POWER_AC_ADAPTER) {
00230         tooltip = g_string_new (devicestr);
00231     }
00232     return tooltip;
00233 }
00234 
00239 GString *
00240 get_main_tooltip (void)
00241 {
00242     GenericObject *slotData = NULL;
00243     GString *tooltip = NULL;
00244     GString *temptip = NULL;
00245     gint a;
00246 
00247     if (state_data.onBatteryPower)
00248         tooltip = g_string_new (_("Computer is running on battery power"));
00249     else if (state_data.onUPSPower)
00250         tooltip = g_string_new (_("Computer is running on UPS power"));
00251     else
00252         tooltip = g_string_new (_("Computer is running on AC power"));
00253 
00254     for (a=0;a<objectData->len;a++) {
00255         slotData = (GenericObject *) g_ptr_array_index (objectData, a);
00256         temptip = get_object_tooltip (slotData);
00257         if (temptip && slotData->powerDevice != POWER_AC_ADAPTER)
00258             g_string_append_printf (tooltip, "\n%s", temptip->str);
00259     }
00260     return tooltip;
00261 }
00262 
00269 static GenericObject *
00270 get_object_of_powertype (int powerDevice, gboolean displayFull)
00271 {
00272     GenericObject *slotData = NULL;
00273     gint a;
00274     /* return value only if not full, or iconDisplayFull set true*/
00275     for (a=0;a<objectData->len;a++) {
00276         slotData = (GenericObject *) g_ptr_array_index (objectData, a);
00277         if (slotData->powerDevice == powerDevice && slotData->present) {
00278             if (displayFull || slotData->percentageCharge != 100)
00279                 return slotData;
00280         }
00281     }
00282     return NULL;
00283 }
00284 
00285 
00294 GenericObject *
00295 get_main_icon_slot (void)
00296 {
00297     GenericObject *slotData = NULL;
00298     GConfClient *client = gconf_client_get_default ();
00299     gboolean showIfFull = gconf_client_get_bool (client, 
00300         GCONF_ROOT "general/display_icon_full", NULL);
00301 
00302     slotData = get_object_of_powertype (POWER_PRIMARY_BATTERY, showIfFull);
00303     if (slotData)
00304         return slotData;
00305 
00306     slotData = get_object_of_powertype (POWER_UPS, showIfFull);
00307     if (slotData)
00308         return slotData;
00309 
00310     slotData = get_object_of_powertype (POWER_AC_ADAPTER, showIfFull);
00311     if (slotData)
00312         return slotData;
00313 
00314     g_warning ("Cannot find preferred main device."
00315            "This may be because you are running on a desktop machine.");
00316     return NULL;
00317 }

00324 static void
00325 callback_actions_activated (GtkMenuItem *menuitem, gpointer user_data)
00326 {
00327     gchar *action = NULL;
00328 
00329     /* assertion checks */
00330     g_assert (menuitem);
00331 
00332     action = g_object_get_data ((GObject*) menuitem, "action");
00333     g_debug ("action = '%s'", action);
00334     if (strcmp (action, "suspend") == 0)
00335         action_policy_do (ACTION_SUSPEND);
00336     else if (strcmp (action, "hibernate") == 0)
00337         action_policy_do (ACTION_HIBERNATE);
00338     else
00339         g_warning ("No handler for '%s'", action);
00340 }

00348 {
00349     return GTK_WIDGET (eggtrayicon->image);
00350 }

00360     const gchar *link,
00361     gpointer user_data)
00362 {
00363     gnome_url_show (link, NULL);
00364 }

00371 static void
00372 callback_about_activated (GtkMenuItem *menuitem, gpointer user_data)
00373 {
00374     const gchar *authors[] = {
00375         "Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>",
00376         NULL};
00377     const gchar *documenters[] = {
00378         "Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>",
00379         NULL};
00380     const gchar *artists[] = {
00381         "Diana Fong <dfong@redhat.com>",
00382         NULL};
00383 
00384     GtkWidget *about = gtk_about_dialog_new ();
00385     GdkPixbuf *logo = gdk_pixbuf_new_from_file (GPM_DATA "gnome-power.png", NULL);
00386     gtk_about_dialog_set_name (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about), "GNOME Power Manager");
00387     gtk_about_dialog_set_version (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about), VERSION);
00388     gtk_about_dialog_set_copyright (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about), 
00389         "\xc2\xa9 2005 Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>");
00390     gtk_about_dialog_set_comments (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about),
00391         "Power Manager for GNOME Desktop");
00392     gtk_about_dialog_set_license (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about), GPLV2);
00396     gtk_about_dialog_set_website (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about), GPMURL);
00397     gtk_about_dialog_set_website_label (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about),
00398         "SourceForge Homepage");
00399     gtk_about_dialog_set_url_hook (callback_about_activated_url, NULL, NULL);
00400     gtk_about_dialog_set_authors (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about), authors);
00401     gtk_about_dialog_set_artists (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about), artists);
00402     gtk_about_dialog_set_documenters (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about), documenters);
00403     gtk_about_dialog_set_translator_credits (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about),
00404         GPMTRANSLATORS);
00405     gtk_about_dialog_set_logo (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (about), logo);
00406     gtk_widget_show (about);
00407     g_object_unref (logo);
00408 }

00415 static void
00416 callback_prefs_activated (GtkMenuItem *menuitem, gpointer user_data)
00417 {
00418     gboolean retval;
00419     gchar *path = NULL;
00420 
00421     /* assertion checks */
00422     g_assert (menuitem);
00423 
00424     path = g_strconcat (BINDIR, "/", "gnome-power-preferences", NULL);
00425     g_debug ("callback_prefs_activated: %s", path);
00426 
00427     retval = g_spawn_command_line_async (path, NULL);
00428     if (!retval)
00429         g_warning ("Couldn't execute command: %s", path);
00430     g_free (path);
00431 }

00440 static void
00441 menu_add_action_item (GtkWidget *menu,
00442     const gchar *icon,
00443     const gchar *name,
00444     const gchar *type)
00445 {
00446     /* get image */
00447     GtkWidget *item = NULL;
00448     GtkWidget *image = NULL;
00449     GdkPixbuf *pixbuf = NULL;
00450 
00451     /* assertion checks */
00452     g_assert (menu);
00453     g_assert (icon);
00454     g_assert (name);
00455     g_assert (type);
00456 
00457     image = gtk_image_new ();
00458     pixbuf = gtk_icon_theme_fallback (icon, 16);
00459 
00460     g_return_if_fail (pixbuf);
00461 
00462     gtk_image_set_from_pixbuf (GTK_IMAGE (image), pixbuf);
00463 
00464     item = gtk_image_menu_item_new_with_label (name);
00465     if (type)
00466         g_object_set_data ((GObject*) item, "action", (gpointer) type);
00467     gtk_image_menu_item_set_image ((GtkImageMenuItem*) item, GTK_WIDGET (image));
00468     g_signal_connect (G_OBJECT (item), "activate", 
00469         G_CALLBACK (callback_actions_activated), (gpointer) menu);
00470     gtk_menu_shell_append (GTK_MENU_SHELL (menu), item);
00471     gtk_widget_show (item);
00472 }

00478 static void
00479 menu_main_create (void)
00480 {
00481     GtkWidget *item = NULL;
00482 
00483     g_assert (eggtrayicon);
00484     g_assert (eggtrayicon->popup_menu == NULL);
00485 
00486     eggtrayicon->popup_menu = gtk_menu_new ();
00487 
00488     item = gtk_image_menu_item_new_from_stock (GTK_STOCK_PREFERENCES, NULL);
00489     g_signal_connect (G_OBJECT (item), "activate",
00490               G_CALLBACK (callback_prefs_activated),
00491               (gpointer) eggtrayicon->popup_menu);
00492     gtk_menu_shell_append (GTK_MENU_SHELL (eggtrayicon->popup_menu), item);
00493     gtk_widget_show (item);
00494 
00495     item = gtk_image_menu_item_new_from_stock (GNOME_STOCK_ABOUT, NULL);
00496     g_signal_connect (G_OBJECT (item), "activate",
00497               G_CALLBACK (callback_about_activated),
00498               (gpointer) eggtrayicon->popup_menu);
00499     gtk_menu_shell_append (GTK_MENU_SHELL (eggtrayicon->popup_menu), item);
00500     gtk_widget_show (item);
00501 
00502     /* add the actions */
00503     item = gtk_separator_menu_item_new ();
00504     gtk_menu_shell_append (GTK_MENU_SHELL (eggtrayicon->popup_menu), item);
00505     menu_add_action_item (eggtrayicon->popup_menu, "gnome-dev-memory",
00506                   _("Suspend"), "suspend");
00507     menu_add_action_item (eggtrayicon->popup_menu, "gnome-dev-harddisk",
00508                   _("Hibernate"), "hibernate");
00509 }
00510 
00518 static gboolean
00519 tray_icon_release (GtkWidget *widget, GdkEventButton *event, TrayData *traydata)
00520 {
00521     /* assertion checks */
00522     g_assert (widget);
00523     g_assert (event);
00524     g_assert (traydata);
00525 
00526     if (!traydata || !traydata->popup_menu)
00527         return TRUE;
00528     if (event->button == 3) {
00529         gtk_menu_popdown (GTK_MENU (traydata->popup_menu));
00530         return FALSE;
00531     }
00532     return TRUE;
00533 }
00534 
00542 static gboolean
00543 tray_icon_press (GtkWidget *widget, GdkEventButton *event, TrayData *traydata)
00544 {
00545     /* assertion checks */
00546     g_assert (widget);
00547     g_assert (event);
00548     g_assert (traydata);
00549 
00550     g_debug ("button : %i", event->button);
00551     if (!traydata || !(traydata->popup_menu))
00552         return TRUE;
00553     if (event->button == 3) {
00554         gtk_menu_popup (GTK_MENU (traydata->popup_menu), NULL, NULL,
00555             NULL, NULL, event->button, event->time);
00556         return TRUE;
00557     }
00558     return FALSE;
00559 }
00560 
00564 void
00565 icon_create (void)
00566 {
00567     GtkWidget *evbox = NULL;
00568 
00569     /* assertion checks */
00570     g_assert (!eggtrayicon);
00571 
00572     /* create new tray object */
00573     eggtrayicon = g_new0 (TrayData, 1);
00574 
00575     /* Event box */
00576     evbox = gtk_event_box_new ();
00577     eggtrayicon->evbox = evbox;
00578     eggtrayicon->tray_icon = egg_tray_icon_new (NICENAME);
00579     eggtrayicon->tray_icon_tooltip = gtk_tooltips_new ();
00580     eggtrayicon->popup_menu = NULL;
00581 
00582     /* will produce a broken image.. */
00583     eggtrayicon->image = gtk_image_new_from_file ("");
00584     g_signal_connect (G_OBJECT (evbox), "button_press_event", 
00585               G_CALLBACK (tray_icon_press), (gpointer) eggtrayicon);
00586     g_signal_connect (G_OBJECT (evbox), "button_release_event", 
00587               G_CALLBACK (tray_icon_release), (gpointer) eggtrayicon);
00588 
00589     gtk_container_add (GTK_CONTAINER (evbox), eggtrayicon->image);
00590     gtk_container_add (GTK_CONTAINER (eggtrayicon->tray_icon), evbox);
00591 
00592     gtk_widget_show_all (GTK_WIDGET (eggtrayicon->tray_icon));
00593 }
00594 
00598 void
00599 gpn_icon_update (void)
00600 {
00601     GConfClient *client = NULL;
00602     gboolean iconShow;
00603     GenericObject *slotData = NULL;
00604     GdkPixbuf *pixbuf = NULL;
00605     GString *tooltip = NULL;
00606 
00607     client = gconf_client_get_default ();
00608     iconShow = gconf_client_get_bool (client, 
00609                 GCONF_ROOT "general/display_icon", NULL);
00610 
00611     if (!iconShow)
00612         g_warning ("The key " GCONF_ROOT "general/display_icon"
00613                 " is set to false, no icon will be displayed");
00614 
00615     slotData = get_main_icon_slot ();
00616     if (iconShow && slotData) {
00617         if (!eggtrayicon) {
00618             /* create icon */
00619             icon_create ();
00620             if (!(eggtrayicon->popup_menu))
00621                 menu_main_create ();
00622         }
00623         /* modify icon */
00624         pixbuf = create_icon_pixbuf (slotData);
00625         if (!pixbuf)
00626             g_error ("Failed to get pixbuf for icon");
00627         gtk_image_set_from_pixbuf (GTK_IMAGE (eggtrayicon->image), pixbuf);
00628         g_object_unref (pixbuf);
00629 
00630         tooltip = get_main_tooltip ();
00631         gtk_tooltips_set_tip (eggtrayicon->tray_icon_tooltip,
00632             GTK_WIDGET (eggtrayicon->tray_icon),
00633             tooltip->str, NULL);
00634         g_string_free (tooltip, TRUE);
00635     } else {
00636         /* remove icon */
00637         if (eggtrayicon) {
00638             icon_destroy (eggtrayicon);
00639             eggtrayicon = NULL;
00640         }
00641     }
00642 }
